scripts.test:ui: npm run test:electron && npm run test:openfin
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:electron -- --reporter reporter.js && npm run test:openfin -- --reporter reporter.js && copyfiles -f "test-report.json" "../api-specification"
scripts.test:electron: rimraf src && copyfiles -f "demo/**" src && cross-env MOCHA_CONTAINER=electron mocha test/*.js
scripts.test:openfin: rimraf src && copyfiles -f "demo/**" src && copyfiles -f "node_modules/containerjs-api-openfin/build/dist/**" src && cross-env MOCHA_CONTAINER=openfin mocha test/*.js
scripts.test:browser: rimraf src && copyfiles -f "demo/**" src && copyfiles -f "node_modules/containerjs-api-browser/build/dist/**" src && cross-env MOCHA_CONTAINER=browser mocha test/*.js
